mapper.sql: a.id AS "id",a.manageid AS "manageid",a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.cbq_return_date1 as cbqReturnDate1, a.check_year AS "checkYear",a.check_result AS "checkResult", a.region_code AS "regionCode",a.regorg AS "regorg",a.regdoc AS "regdoc",a.regdate AS "regdate", a.submits_status AS "submitsStatus",a.submit_date AS "submitDate", a.trans_date AS "transDate", a.print_date AS "printDate", a.close_status AS "closeStatus", a.close_date AS "closeDate",a.close_result AS "closeResult", a.check_quality_flag AS "checkQualityFlag", a.checkresult_quality_flag AS "checkresultQualityFlag", a.upload_time AS "uploadTime",a.source_id AS "sourceId",a.ischange AS "ischange",a.del_flag AS "delFlag",a.create_by AS "createBy",a.create_date AS "createDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crc_regcase( id,manageid,cbq_return_date1,cbq_return_date2, id_number,check_year,check_result, region_code,regorg,regdoc, regdate,submits_status,submit_date, trans_date,print_date, close_status,close_date,close_result, check_quality_flag,checkresult_quality_flag, upload_time,source_id, ischange,del_flag,create_by,create_date ) VALUES ( #{id},#{manageid},#{cbqReturnDate1},#{cbqReturnDate2}, #{idNumber},#{checkYear},#{checkResult}, #{regionCode},#{regorg},#{regdoc}, #{regdate},#{submitsStatus},#{submitDate}, #{transDate},#{printDate}, #{closeStatus},#{closeDate},#{closeResult}, #{checkQualityFlag},#{checkresultQualityFlag}, #{uploadTime},#{sourceId}, #{ischange},'0',#{createBy},SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE crc_regcase SET cbq_return_date1=#{cbqReturnDate1}, cbq_return_date2=#{cbqReturnDate2}, check_result = #{checkResult}, region_code = #{regionCode},regorg = #{regorg},regdoc = #{regdoc},regdate = #{regdate}, submits_status = #{submitsStatus},submit_date = #{submitDate}, trans_date = #{transDate},print_date = #{printDate}, close_status = #{closeStatus},close_date = #{closeDate},close_result = #{closeResult}, check_quality_flag = #{checkQualityFlag},checkresult_quality_flag = #{checkresultQualityFlag}, upload_time = #{uploadTime}, ischange = #{ischange} WHERE Id_number = #{idNumber}
UPDATE crc_regcase SET del_flag = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
